channel.title: [PI] My NPC Drops Help! [PI]
channel.description:
So I tried adding a New NPC and added drops to it by using this method:
#Nomad 8528:20 3025:19 3025:28 3025:23 1514:375 1437:4800 7158:1 17295:1 17295:1 13350:1 13348:1 13346:1 13355:1 1
And I get this error when running my server:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:58) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(init)(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.(clinit)(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 157s. [6/25/12 3:12 PM]: Launching Fictionscape... [6/25/12 3:12 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 141ms. [6/25/12 3:12 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43954[/code]
Any Help? Thanks!
**Also, I did use tabs inbetween the numbers. If you were wondering..**

item.title: [PI] My NPC Drops Help! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

theres a random 1 at the end
